description: Making beautifully moulded, professional-looking bars and slabs of chocolate is a lot easier than you’d think. If you’ve made chocolate from cocoa beans, this is the best way to show off your creation.

name: Chocolate Bars & Slabs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Ensure the mold is clean and dry before you begin. Use a ladle to carefully fill the mold with tempered chocolate. Start towards the centre of the mold and gently push the towards the edges using the base of the ladle.

If your mold has cavities for multiple bars, repeat this process to fill them all. Firmly tap the mold on the work surface several times to remove remaining air bubbles. Take care to keep the mold level and not to splash chocolate.

Place the filled mold into the fridge for 2030 minutes to set. Don’t leave the chocolate in the fridge for longer than this, or condensation may form on its surface. When your chocolate is set, it will shrink away from the edges of the mold, allowing it to be removed easily.

Place a clean chopping board or baking tray on top of the mold. Clasp the mold and board together firmly with both hands, then turn both over at the same time. The bars should drop out of the mold cleanly, leaving you with beautifully tempered, homemade chocolate.
